item.title: LfE 13: The last day and the Bicycle story
item.description: 06/12/2009 Hello! Itâ€™s nearly noon on this bright sunshiny Sunday. The temperature is 8 Degrees Celsius. Last night it hit an unusual 9 degrees! I had planned to pull out my gloves only after December started but I remember November days being colder than this!

item.title: Deivam Thantha Veedu
item.description: This is a slightly philosophical song. His sister is the breadwinner of the family and he is a â€˜good for nothingâ€™ alcoholic, she treats him with contempt.

item.title: Arranged Marriage
item.description: Arranged marriage is an old concept. It existed long before people accepted love (that occurred before marriage) as a valid reason to marry. The process through which this changed is reflected very well in the movie â€˜Fiddler on the Roofâ€™.
